parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The shudder and jerky motion can cause loss of control, accidents, and injuries, especially when merging into traffic or driving at high speeds.
symptoms: The vehicle shudders or jerks when accelerating or decelerating
often accompanied by fluctuating engine RPMs; the transmission may hesitate or slam into gear
causing the vehicle to lurch forward.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the torque converter can cause the transmission to malfunction, leading to loss of control, accidents, and injuries.
symptoms: The transmission may hesitate or slam into gear
causing the vehicle to lurch forward; the vehicle may experience jerky motion

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The erratic shifting and hard downshifts can cause loss of control, accidents, and injuries, especially when driving at slow speeds or in heavy traffic.
symptoms: causing the vehicle to jerk or lurch forward; hard downshifts may occur when coming to a stop
causing the vehicle to lurch forward.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The transmission fluid starvation can cause the transmission to malfunction, leading to loss of control, accidents, and injuries.
symptoms: The transmission may hesitate or slam into gear
causing the vehicle to lurch forward; the transmission may overheat
causing the warning lamp to illuminate.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The cracking of the rear wheel rim can cause air leakage, leading to loss of tire pressure, which can result in accidents, especially at high speeds. This is a safety concern, particularly for high-performance vehicles like the Corvette Z06.
symptoms: Cracks on the inside rim of the wheel
often near the tire bead; air leakage; low tire pressure warning light activation; rapid loss of air pressure at freeway speeds.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Lifter failure can cause engine noise, decreased performance, and potentially lead to engine damage.
Radiator failure can cause overheating, engine damage, and potentially lead to engine failure.
Valve spring failure can cause engine misfires, decreased performance, and potentially lead to engine damage.
Transmission issues can cause difficulty shifting, hesitation, and potentially lead to transmission failure.
Fuel system issues can cause difficulty refueling, fuel leaks, and potentially lead to engine stalling or failure.
Engine noise can cause decreased performance, engine damage, and potentially lead to engine failure.
symptoms: noise intensifies when loading the engine.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Unintended engine start can cause accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
Engine misfires and jerking can cause decreased performance, engine damage, and potentially lead to engine failure.
